GlobalStrings.String: ENTERING THE NAME OF THIS PROGRAM FOLLOWED BY THE COMMAND
THIS IS A PASS THROUGH PROGRAM. YOU USE IT EXECUTE OTHER
DISPLAY WILL BE IN EFFECT ONLY WHILE THE SECOND PROGRAM
PROGRAMS. THE HOT KEY COMBINATION TO START UP THE TEXT
IS RUNNING. YOU START THIS PASS THROUGH PROGRAM BY
THAT YOU WOULD LIKE TO EXECUTE.
